#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Tee.

== Name ==

*[CTee Tee]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Tee (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Description of a hole played from a set of tee.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
    
===  Model ===

	<...  number = [SOneToEighteen OneToEighteen]>  ([SPar par], [SHandicapStroke handicap-stroke], [CLengthWithUnits length]{0,2}  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [SHandicapStroke golfml:HandicapStroke] || [SHandicapStroke handicap-stroke] ||  					Relative difficulty level of the hole for this set of tees.				 ||
|| [CLengthWithUnits golfml:LengthWithUnits] || [CLengthWithUnits length] ||  Length of the hole from the set of tees ||
|| [SPar golfml:Par] || [SPar par] ||  					Par score for the hole.				 ||

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
